attributes.title: HORRIFIED
attributes.review: I saw that this app was going to be the replacement for tiktok, so I decided to download it. To my dismay, I was greeted by some kind of monster throwing what looked to be gang symbols. I assume they are gang symbols bc one of my neighbors saw it and immediately shot my grandmother. Now, my grandmother is a trump supporter and it is a shame that he is making his supporters targets. After my grandmother was shot, we tried to take her to the hospital but she said that it was what trump wanted and decided to lay on the porch and bleed out for 16 hours. Overall I do not approve of this app, I wish I could give it -6 stars but sadly that is not how the solar system works. RIP grandma P â¤ï¸
